com.amazon.device.associates
Interface LinkService

public interface LinkService

This interface provides methods for developers to build links to Amazon products and allow shopping in a browser upon a user action.

Method Summary
 void openRetailPage(OpenRetailPageRequest request)
          Used to load a Amazon retail webpage for a given OpenRetailPageRequest.
 boolean overrideLinkInvocation(android.webkit.WebView webView, java.lang.String url)
          Used to intercepts a link invocation from a webview.
 

Method Detail

openRetailPage

void openRetailPage(OpenRetailPageRequest request)
Used to load a Amazon retail webpage for a given OpenRetailPageRequest. OpenRetailPageRequest can be one of below
  • OpenProductPageRequest for product page.
  • OpenSearchPageRequest for a search page.
  • OpenHomePageRequest for the Amazon retail web.

    • Parameters:
    request - the retail page request.
    Throws:
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if request is null.

    overrideLinkInvocation

    boolean overrideLinkInvocation(android.webkit.WebView webView,
                               java.lang.String url)
    Used to intercepts a link invocation from a webview. If it is an Amazon link, the URL is converted to a Mobile Associates URL with attributions; the url will open in a browser window. Non-Amazon links open in the webview. Developers should use this method in shouldOverrideUrl() of their WebViewClient implementation.

    Parameters:
    webView - the webView in which content shown.
    url - the url which is to be loaded in webView.
    Throws:
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if webView or url is null.
